column2: 144 # (60) [integer] amount by which the sim is speeded up relative to real time
6 # (6 Hz) [integer] iteration time for main sim loop
600 # time in seconds of sim time between state vector dumps; values <= 0 switch it off
average # "average" or "total" shown in control panel numeric header
True # whether the frame rate is synched to real time or not
4 # determines volatility of static models & scale of storage elements
